LATWAG wells
```{r}
#Wells where water samples were taken and wells that we nearest to described soil pits.
#Missing 52_4_d2, 86_2_s1
NAMES = list('42_2_s1','42_3_s1','42_3_s2','42_3_s3','42_4_s1','42_4_s2','42_4_s3','42_4_d1','42_4_d2','52_2_s1','52_3_s1','52_3_s2','52_3_s3','52_4_s1','52_4_s2','52_4_s3','52_4_d1','86_3_s1', '86_3_s2', '86_3_s3','86_4_s1_JB', '86_4_s2', '86_4_s3')

wellDatasList <- list()

for (well in NAMES){
  wellDatasList[[well]] <- read_csv(paste(well,"csv", sep = "."))
}

#add the well name column for each well's data table
i <- 1
wellsWNamesList <- list()
for (well in wellDatasList){
  wellsWNamesList[[i]] <- well %>% mutate(Well = NAMES[[i]])
  i <- i + 1
}

#one table
allWellData <- do.call(rbind, wellsWNamesList)


AVERAGES <- allWellData %>%
  group_by(Well) %>%
  summarise_at(.vars = vars(`Water Level`), .funs = mean, na.rm = TRUE) 
```
